content: In what 1939 film does Judy Garland play a young girl who travels to a magical land with her dog Toto?

The 1939 film where Judy Garland plays a young girl named Dorothy Gale, who travels to the magical land of Oz with her dog Toto, is called "The Wizard of Oz." This iconic movie is based on the novel "The Wonderful Wizard of Oz" by L. Frank Baum and has become a classic in American cinema.
